mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical website from Best for Britain, getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats.

issues.brexitEurope: You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other than the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit. In fact, recent polls show the Liberal Democrats are the most popular party for Remainers.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 1 Vincent Square, London, SW1P 2PN

images.caption: Mike Smithson, Polling and Elections Expert

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains text from Mike Smithson concerning the tactical situation and support for the Liberal Democrats in the Wantage constituency for the upcoming election. Specific policy details, endorsements, candidate information and quotes are not included.
